cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By clicking 'Accept', you consent to our use of cookies.
cookieConsent.fullPolicy:
What are cookies and why do we use them?

Cookies are small text files that a website stores on your computer or mobile device when you visit it to recognize the browser you are using while browsing the website.

In order to simplify your browsing on our website, we use cookies through which useful information about your search preferences is collected. At the same time, cookies allow us to monitor the performance and traffic on our website in order to improve its presentation and content taking into account your preferences.

What cookies do we use?

Some or all of the cookies described below are stored in your browser. You can view and manage cookies through your browser.

Our website uses the following cookies:

1. Strictly necessary:
Strictly necessary cookies are particularly important for the proper functioning of our website as they allow you to browse and use its functions. These cookies do not recognize your individual identity. Without these cookies, we cannot offer effective operation of our website.
These cookies temporarily store some of your preferences such as which subpages of our online store you like the most, in order to provide improved and personalized functions.
The table with this type of cookies follows:

Cookie name:ActivityHow long the Cookie stays on your device?
e134a6f358803ab8011526f6ea8d0264Temporary and necessary cookieA session cookie is deleted when you close your web browser.
f23312b785b0505e62e5adfa6d5f94efTemporary and necessary cookieA session cookie is deleted when you close your web browser.

2. Performance Cookies
Google analytics:
These cookies collect information about how you use our website, for example which pages you visit most often. These cookies collect aggregated, anonymous information that does not directly identify any visitor. They are used exclusively to improve the performance of a website.

Acceptance of installation of cookies

Article 4, paragraph 5 of Law 3471/2006 regulates the installation and use of cookies always upon the consent of the user. This means that a cookie can be installed on your computer or mobile device only if you have given your consent after detailed information about this installation, the purpose of the processing, the exercise of the right of access and any recipients of the data.

This consent can be given through appropriate settings in the web browser or through another application. For this reason, when you enter our website for the first time, you will be informed with a relevant message that will appear at the bottom of the website that you accept and understand the use of cookies that ensure the proper functioning of our website.

Controlling and Deleting Cookies

If you choose to disable cookies, some parts of the website may not function properly. All browsers have the ability to manage cookies from the websites you visit. For more information, please refer to your browser's security settings.

More information about the types of cookies is available at allaboutcookies.org. If you would like to learn how to control or remove cookies, you can visit aboutcookies.org.

Changes to this policy

This Cookies Policy may be modified at any time. Visitors to our website should refer to it periodically to be informed of any changes. This policy came into effect on 25/01/2025. In the event of a modification, the date on which it took place will be indicated. The Cookies policy, as formed by the most recent modification, is always considered valid.
